T02D2851:192a-1: sh'a ta aa ksha ra tantra kra ma mandal tsakra au pa de sha s'a dha nam /
T02D2851:192a-3: yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D2851:192a-4: mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags
T02D2851:192a-5: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2851:192a-6: // re zhig dang por ting nge 'dzin dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su zhugs nas /
T02D2851:192a-7: thal mo sbyar la spyi bor bzhag nas shar phyogs su /
T02D2851:192a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra banda nam ka ro mi zhes phyag bya'o //
T02D2851:192a-9: de bzhin du lho phyogs nas /
T02D2851:192a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ratna banda nam ka ro mi /
T02D2851:192a-12: de bzhin du nub phyogs su /
T02D2851:192a-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta padma banda nam ka ro mi /
T02D2851:192a-15: de bzhin du byang phyogs su /
T02D2851:192a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ka rma banda nam ka ro mi //
T02D2851:192a-17: zhes bya bas phyag bzhi byas la /
T02D2851:192a-18: g-yas pa'i khu tshur spyi bor bzhag nas /
T02D2851:192a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta audbha ba ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2851:192a-20: zhes bya bas lus dang ngag dang sems byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2851:192a-21: khu tshur de nyid kyis kha la /
T02D2851:192a-22: aom padmod bha b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2851:192a-23: zhes bya bas ngag byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2851:192a-24: g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas /
T02D2851:192a-25: aom badzrod bha b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2851:192a-26: zhes bya bas sems byin gyis brlab bar bya'o //
T02D2851:192a-27: de'i rjes la chog 'dis bgegs bsal bar bya ste /
T02D2851:192a-28: aom aa mri ta ha na ha na sarba bi ghn'am da ha da ha /
T02D2851:192a-30: ces bya ba brjod la thal mo sbyar nas /
T02D2851:192a-31: mthe bong bar du bzhag pa de la badzra h'um
T02D2851:192a-32: phat ces bya ba'i yi ge 'bar pa'i rnam par
T02D2851:192a-33: bkod la / thal mo de las phyogs bcur 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'phro bar bsams nas /
T02D2851:192a-34: aom aa mri ta ha na han sarba bighn'ana da ha da ha /
T02D2851:192a-36: ces bya ba 'di lan bdun brjod la thal mo
T02D2851:192a-37: lan gsum brdabs nas se gol yang lan gsum brdab
T02D2851:192a-38: par bya'o // de'i rjes la sngar bshad pa'i 'bar
T02D2851:192a-39: ba'i rdo rje las rdo rje dra bas bgegs thams
T02D2851:192a-41: de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2851:192a-42: de'i steng du re pha las me 'bar ba'i rnam pa bsams la /
T02D2851:192a-43: rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2851:192a-44: rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D2851:192b-0: @192b aom padma satva sa ma ya /
T02D2851:192b-2: padma satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D2851:192b-4: su to shyo me bha wa /
T02D2851:192b-5: aa nu rakto me bha wa /
T02D2851:192b-6: su po shyo me bha wa /
T02D2851:192b-11: bhag b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta padma m'a me
T02D2851:192b-12: munytsa padma badzri bta ba ma h'a sa ma ya
T02D2851:192b-13: sa tva a'a: zhes lan bdun brjod do //
T02D2851:192b-14: spyi bor aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu
T02D2851:192b-15: drug pa bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid la yi ge aom
T02D2851:192b-16: gyis brlabs la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2851:192b-17: sngags brjod pa'i rjes nyid la snying ga'i gnas su
T02D2851:192b-18: re pha las me sbar la lus thams cad bsregs
T02D2851:192b-19: la yang spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi 'bab par
T02D2851:192b-20: bsam mo // de'i rjes la rdo rje thal mo bcings la /
T02D2851:192b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pastha n'a ya a'atma nam nirya ta y'a mi /
T02D2851:192b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa sha ma se
T02D2851:192b-23: ta sarba satva nam sarba siddha ya sam paryan tam
T02D2851:192b-24: / sarba ta th'a ga tashtsa aa dhi tishtha tvam /
T02D2851:192b-25: zhes bya ba 'di nyid lan gsum brjod la /
T02D2851:192b-26: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2851:192b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nam mkha' yongs su
T02D2851:192b-28: gang bar lhag par mos la de rnams yid kyis
T02D2851:192b-29: mchod nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs
T02D2851:192b-30: pa bya'o // aom dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2851:192b-31: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D2851:192b-32: 'gro ba'i bsod nams rjes yi rang //
T02D2851:192b-33: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D2851:192b-34: zhes bya bas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2851:192b-35: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2851:192b-36: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2851:192b-38: aom sva dh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddhonya\ham /
T02D2851:192b-40: byang chub kyi sems tsam la lhag par gnas pa sems kyis mthong nas /
T02D2851:192b-41: aom dharm'a dh'a tu sva bh'a pa a'atma konya\ham /
T02D2851:192b-43: byang chub kyi sems de yi ge pam gyi rnam par yongs su gyur par mthong nas /
T02D2851:192b-44: de nas sna tshogs padma chen por bskyed la /
T02D2851:192b-45: de'i steng du yi ge aa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2851:192b-46: de'i steng du yang yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2851:192b-47: de'i steng du bhr'um dkar po /
T02D2851:192b-48: de las mchod rten dkar po /
T02D2851:192b-50: rnam pa gsum du spros pa nyid kyis bum pa dang /
T02D2851:192b-51: kha khyar thams cad kyi steng du yang yi ge h'um bsams la /
T02D2851:192b-52: bum pa de'i nang du yang aa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2851:193a-1: steng du yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2851:193a-2: de la yi ge drug las 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma dmar po /
T02D2851:193a-3: mtshams kyi 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa /
T02D2851:193a-4: de'i steng du yi ge hr'i:las 'dab ma drug pa'i padma dkar po //
T02D2851:193a-5: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2851:193a-6: de'i steng du aom ma ni padme h'um /
T02D2851:193a-7: zhes bya ba yi ge drug pa gong nas gong du nang du zhugs par rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D2851:193a-8: de gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dkar
T02D2851:193a-9: po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal gcig
T02D2851:193a-10: pa phyag drug pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu
T02D2851:193a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g-yas pa'i dang po ni
T02D2851:193a-13: ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya de'i rtse mo la
T02D2851:193a-16: gsum pa'i phyag skyabs sbyin la rin po che zur drug pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2851:193a-17: phyag g-yon gyi dang pos padma'i steng du rin po
T02D2851:193a-18: che zur drug pa gnas pa la padma 'dab ma
T02D2851:193a-19: drug pa'o // gnyis pa la dbyug pa /
T02D2851:193a-20: gsum pa la ri la ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
T02D2851:193a-21: de'i g-yon gyi padma la bcom ldan 'das padma sgrol
T02D2851:193a-22: ma aom padma t'a ri h'um zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2851:193a-24: khyad par ni padma dor la autpa la'i steng du
T02D2851:193a-25: rin po che zur drug pa'i steng du padma 'dab
T02D2851:193a-27: shar du aom badzra padma h'um /
T02D2851:193a-29: nub tu aom mu ne padma h'um /
T02D2851:193a-30: byang du aom karma padma h'um /
T02D2851:193a-31: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rim pa 'dis /
T02D2851:193a-35: las kyi padma rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rnam par blta'o //
T02D2851:193a-36: khyad par ni padma'i steng du rin po che zur drug pa'i steng du rdo rje dang /
T02D2851:193a-40: me'i phyogs su aom badzra t'a re h'um /
T02D2851:193a-41: bden bral gyi phyogs su aom ratna t'a re h'um /
T02D2851:193a-42: rlung gi phyogs su aom mu ne t'a re h'um /
T02D2851:193a-43: dbang ldan du aom karma t'a re h'um /
T02D2851:193a-44: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis go rims bzhin du bcom
T02D2851:193a-45: ldan 'das nyid kyi rnam par rdo rje sgrol ma
T02D2851:193a-46: dang / rin chen sgrol ma dang /
T02D2851:193a-48: las kyi sgrol ma dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas pa'o //
T02D2851:193a-49: khyad par ni autpa la'i steng bzhin du /
T02D2851:193a-50: rin po che zur drug pa'i gnas su rdo rje dang /
T02D2851:193b-2: brgyad po 'di dag sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2851:193b-3: phyogs mtshams kyi 'dab ma la shar phyogs su aom ya m'anta ka h'um /
T02D2851:193b-4: lho ru aom pradzny'an ta ka h'um /
T02D2851:193b-5: nub tu aom padm'anta ka h'um /
T02D2851:193b-6: byang du aom bighn'anta ka h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags
T02D2851:193b-7: kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi ngo bor khro bo
T02D2851:193b-9: khyad par ni g-yas brkyang ba /
T02D2851:193b-10: mi'u thung gi rnam pa la zhal rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D2851:193b-11: sna gong nyag pa smin ma ser skya nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
T02D2851:193b-12: 'od 'bar ba'i dbus su gnas par bsgom mo //
T02D2851:193b-13: thams cad kyi g-yon pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag dag ni sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02D2851:193b-14: g-yas pa'i phyag dag la tho ba'o //
T02D2851:193b-17: lhag ma'i phyag gnyis la padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2851:193b-18: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed la snying gar bam las padma dkar po /
T02D2851:193b-19: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2851:193b-20: steng du aom ma ni padme h'um zhes snga ma
T02D2851:193b-21: bzhin du yi ge rnams bsams la /
T02D2851:193b-22: de las 'od zer spros nas sems can thams cad yang dag par sbyangs nas /
T02D2851:193b-23: bcom ldan 'das gyi ngo bor [?] bsgrubs nas /
T02D2851:193b-24: yang bsdus te de nyid du zhugs so //
T02D2851:193b-25: de'i rjes la sngags kha nas byung nas rdo rje'i
T02D2851:193b-26: lam nas rjes su zhugs nas mu tig gi phreng
T02D2851:193b-27: ba ltar bsams nas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2851:193b-28: bzlas pa byas nas snying ga'i sngags las cig car
T02D2851:193b-29: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo phyi rol du spros nas
T02D2851:193b-30: mchod par bya'o // 'di dag gi sngags ni /
T02D2851:193b-31: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aargham p'u dza ma
T02D2851:193b-32: gha sa mu dra sphar na sa ma ye h'um
T02D2851:193b-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra pushpa p'u dza
T02D2851:193b-35: me ghas mu dra sphar na sa ma ye h'um
T02D2851:193b-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ratna p'u ja me ghas mu dra sphar na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2851:193b-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha p'u dza me
T02D2851:193b-40: gha sa mu dra spha ra na byu ha h'um
T02D2851:193b-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta r'a sa ae gro
T02D2851:193b-43: bi ta ni aa ha ri na santa ra pa
T02D2851:193b-44: ya me p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha
T02D2851:193b-45: ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2851:193b-47: de ltar mchod pa byas nas /
T02D2851:193b-48: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyi yi ge la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2851:194a-3: langs la rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D2851:194a-4: yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D2851:194a-6: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma h'a dza na dang /
